SpaceClient

Class HitBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • SpaceClient.HitBox

  • public class HitBox
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages all hit boxes for each object (ships, planets, missiles).
    Author:
    Kyle Kornetzke
